About

I work as a visual effects artist in a post production house in Belgium on feature movies and commercials. Filming has been one of my passions since my very early days. Every part of filmmaking interests me, whether it is building a story, shooting, or finishing it to show the world. Telling stories is what I love to do virtually and in the real world.

© 2020, Angel Motion Pictures
